xwikidoc.title: AdminTranslations
xwikidoc.content:
administration.title=管理 administration.title.page=管理此页面 administration.title.wiki=Wiki管理 administration.title.global=全域管理 administration.sectionTitle=管理：{0} administration.sectionTitle.page=管理此页面：{0} administration.sectionTitle.wiki=管理此维基：{0} administration.sectionTitle.global=全域管理：{0} administration.menu.label=管理部分 administration.menu.search.hint=查找… administration.menu.search.noResults=尚无结果。
# Registration Section XWiki.XWikiPreferences_use_email_verification.hint=向新注册的用户发送电子邮件以确认邮件地址。 ### Missing: XWiki.XWikiPreferences_validation_email_content.hint=The email template that will be send to users in order to validate their email address. ### Missing: XWiki.XWikiPreferences_confirmation_email_content.hint=The email template that corresponds to the mail that is sent after the user validates his account by clicking on the validation link in the first email he receives. ### Missing: XWiki.XWikiPreferences_invitation_email_content.hint=The email template that will be send to users that are invited to register. ### Missing: XWiki.Registration_heading.hint=This is the line at the top of the page which is shown to people who are registering and when they have just registered. Velocity and wiki syntax may be used. ### Missing: XWiki.Registration_welcomeMessage.hint=This is only shown when people are filling out the form. Velocity and wiki Syntax code may be used. ### Missing: XWiki.Registration_loginButton_enabled.hint=When the user has registered, we provide a button for them to click which will post their user name and password to the login action and get them logged in right away. This however causes the user name and password to be passed back in the HTML which may be unacceptable depending on your security needs. ### Missing: XWiki.Registration_loginButton_autoLogin_enabled.hint=If login button is enabled, then you can have a piece of JavaScript push the login button for the user. ### Missing: XWiki.Registration_defaultRedirect.hint=This is the URL the user will be redirected to after pushing the login button if the xredirect parameter is not specified. Velocity code may be used. ### Missing: XWiki.Registration_requireCaptcha.hint=Set this true to require the user to solve a CAPTCHA in order to register. ### Missing: XWiki.Registration_registrationSuccessMessage.hint=This is shown to the user when they have registered successfully. Velocity and wiki syntax code may be used. ### Missing: XWiki.Registration_passwordLength.hint=The minimum length of the password. A longer password is more secure, it is recommended to keep it above 6 characters. ### Missing: XWiki.Registration_passwordRuleOneLowerCaseEnabled.hint=If checked, force the user to chose a password with at least one lowercase character. ### Missing: XWiki.Registration_passwordRuleOneUpperCaseEnabled.hint=If checked, force the user to chose a password with at least one uppercase character. ### Missing: XWiki.Registration_passwordRuleOneNumberEnabled.hint=If checked, force the user to chose a password with at least one number. ### Missing: XWiki.Registration_passwordRuleOneSymbolEnabled.hint=If checked, force the user to chose a password with at least one symbol character.
# Look & Feel Sections ### Missing: admin.themes=Themes ### Missing: admin.themes.description=Customize the color and icon themes, skin and logo. ### Missing: admin.colorthemes.local=Local ### Missing: admin.colorthemes.global=Global ### Missing: XWiki.XWikiPreferences_showannotations.hint=Display the annotations section in the page layout. ### Missing: XWiki.XWikiPreferences_showcomments.hint=Display the comments section in the page layout. ### Missing: XWiki.XWikiPreferences_showattachments.hint=Display the attachments section in the page layout. ### Missing: XWiki.XWikiPreferences_showhistory.hint=Display the history section in the page layout. ### Missing: XWiki.XWikiPreferences_showinformation.hint=Display the information section in the page layout. ### Missing: XWiki.XWikiPreferences_title.hint=Define the page title format as seen by browsers. ### Missing: XWiki.XWikiPreferences_meta.hint=Define the meta data added to each page, specifying page description, author, keywords etc. ### Missing: XWiki.XWikiPreferences_webcopyright.hint=Define the informations displayed in the copyright section of the footer. ### Missing: XWiki.XWikiPreferences_version.hint=Define the informations displayed in the version section of the footer. ### Missing: XWiki.XWikiPreferences_skin.hint=Specify the default skin used. It can be a filesystem skin, example "flamingo", or a custom page skin, example "XWiki.DefaultSkin" ### Missing: XWiki.XWikiPreferences_iconTheme.hint=Specify the icon theme to use by default. ### Missing: XWiki.XWikiPreferences_colorTheme.hint=Specify the color theme to use by default.
# Editing Sections ### Missing: admin.edit=Editing ### Missing: admin.edit.description=Configure the edit mode, the WYSIWYG editor and the available syntaxes. ### Missing: admin.title=Title ### Missing: XWiki.XWikiPreferences_xwiki.title.mandatory.hint=Prevent the users from creating wiki pages with empty title. ### Missing: XWiki.XWikiPreferences_editor.hint=Select the type of editor to use by default for editing the page content. ### Missing: XWiki.XWikiPreferences_editcomment.hint=Allow entering a message when creating a new page version. ### Missing: XWiki.XWikiPreferences_editcomment_mandatory.hint=For each change made, the page will not be saved until a version summary message is given. ### Missing: XWiki.XWikiPreferences_minoredit.hint=Allow pages to have major (x.1) and minor (1.x) versions. The minor versions can be seen using the "Show Minor Edits" button from the page History. ### Missing: admin.wysiwyg.description=Choose the default WYSIWYG editor and configure it. ### Missing: XWiki.XWikiPreferences_core.defaultDocumentSyntax.hint=The markup syntax used by default for the page content when creating a new wiki page.
# Localization Section ### Missing: XWiki.XWikiPreferences_multilingual.hint=Enable multilingual mode if your wiki has content in multiple languages. This will allow your users to translate the wiki pages and to view the interface in their preferred language. ### Missing: XWiki.XWikiPreferences_languages.hint=Select the languages that will be available in the interface. The users will be able to translate the pages of your wiki in any of these languages (if multilingual mode is enabled). ### Missing: XWiki.XWikiPreferences_default_language.hint=Select the default language of the wiki ### Missing: XWiki.XWikiPreferences_dateformat.hint=Specify the format used to display the dates (e.g. the page creation date) ### Missing: XWiki.XWikiPreferences_timezone.hint=Globally set the timezone for the dates
# Import Section ### Missing: administration.section.import.hint=Begin by uploading a new package or by selecting one from the list of available packages. The content of the selected package will be displayed on the right along with the import options.
# Export Section ### Missing: administration.section.export.pages=Pages ### Missing: administration.section.export.pages.all=All pages ### Missing: administration.section.export.withHistory.hint=Include the page history in the export. Only the latest version of a page is exported otherwise. ### Missing: administration.section.export.targetXWikiVersion=Target XWiki version ### Missing: administration.section.export.targetXWikiVersion.hint=The version of XWiki where you want to import the pages. Your current version is {0}. ### Missing: administration.section.export.targetXWikiVersion.12plus=12.0 and above ### Missing: administration.section.export.targetXWikiVersion.below12=Below 12.0 ### Missing: administration.section.export.packageName.hint=The file name used when generating the archive with the exported wiki pages. ### Missing: administration.section.export.moreOptions=More options ### Missing: administration.section.export.lessOptions=Less options ### Missing: administration.section.export.description.hint=The package description, displayed when importing the package. ### Missing: administration.section.export.author.hint=The package author, displayed when importing the package. ### Missing: administration.section.export.licence.hint=The content license. E.g.: LGPL, GPLV2, etc. ### Missing: administration.section.export.version.hint=The package version, stored in the package descriptor. ### Missing: administration.section.export.backupPack.hint=Preserve the page author when importing the pages. This option has no effect on the exported content and can be changed before the import.
# Users Section ### Missing: administration.section.users.enableUser.inProgress=Enabling user account... ### Missing: administration.section.users.enableUser.done=User account enabled ### Missing: administration.section.users.enableUser.failed=Failed to enable the user account ### Missing: administration.section.users.disableUser.inProgress=Disabling user account... ### Missing: administration.section.users.disableUser.done=User account disabled ### Missing: administration.section.users.disableUser.failed=Failed to disable the user account ### Missing: administration.section.users.deleteUser.confirmationMessage=The user {0} will be deleted and removed from all the {1}groups{2} that they were part of. Are you sure you want to proceed? ### Missing: administration.section.users.deleteUser.programmingRightsWarning=The user you''re about to delete has Programming Rights and is the last author of {0}{1,choice,1#1 page|1<{1} pages}{2}. If {1,choice,1#this page has|1<these pages have} scripts requiring programming rights then these scripts will stop working if you delete the user without replacing the author. ### Missing: administration.section.users.deleteUser.scriptRightsWarning=The user you''re about to delete has Script Rights and is the last author of {0}{1,choice,1#1 page|1<{1} pages}{2}. The scripts from {1,choice,1#this page|1<these pages} may stop working if you delete the user without replacing the author. ### Missing: administration.section.users.deleteUser.newAuthor=New Author ### Missing: administration.section.users.deleteUser.newAuthor.hint=Select an user that has {0} rights or leave this field empty if you don''t want to replace the author. ### Missing: administration.section.users.deleteUser.newAuthor.error=The selected user doesn''t have {0} rights! ### Missing: administration.section.users.deleteUser.newAuthor.programming=programming ### Missing: administration.section.users.deleteUser.newAuthor.script=script admin.usersgroups.extensionrights=扩展权限
# Groups section administration.section.groups.deleteUserFromGroup.loading=从组中删除成员 administration.section.groups.deleteUserFromGroup.success=已成功从组中删除成员 administration.section.groups.deleteUserFromGroup.failure=无法从组中删除成员
# Other Category admin.other=其他的 admin.other.description=各种扩展配置。 administration.section.analytics.status=状态 administration.section.analytics.status.hint=确定 Google Analytics™ 中的跟踪是否有效
# Social category admin.social=社会 admin.social.description=社交功能的配置。
# Configurable Class XWiki.ConfigurableClass_displayInSection=在部分中显示 XWiki.ConfigurableClass_heading=标题 XWiki.ConfigurableClass_configurationClass=配置类 XWiki.ConfigurableClass_linkPrefix=链接前缀 XWiki.ConfigurableClass_propertiesToShow=要显示的属性 XWiki.ConfigurableClass_codeToExecute=要执行的代码 XWiki.ConfigurableClass_iconAttachment=图标附件 XWiki.ConfigurableClass_displayInCategory=按类别显示 XWiki.ConfigurableClass_displayBeforeCategory=在类别之前显示 XWiki.ConfigurableClass_categoryIcon=类别图标 XWiki.ConfigurableClass_scope=范围 ### Missing: XWiki.ConfigurableClass_scope_WIKI=Wiki XWiki.ConfigurableClass_scope_SPACE=当前空间 XWiki.ConfigurableClass_scope_ALL_SPACES=所有空间 XWiki.ConfigurableClass_scope_WIKI+ALL_SPACES=Wiki 和所有空间 XWiki.ConfigurableClass_sectionOrder=分段顺序
## Used to indicate where deprecated keys end #@deprecatedstart
## Deprecated since 11.6RC1 XWiki.XWikiPreferences_auth_active_check.hint=如果设置为 “Yes”，它将阻止用户在不输入之前通过电子邮件发送的令牌的情况下登录。 administration.section.users.deleteUser.markInactiveMessage=您可以将用户的个人资料标记为非活动状态，而不是删除用户。这将阻止他们登录，并保留与他们编写的脚本相关的访问权限。
## Deprecated since 11.8RC1 administration.section.users.deleteUser.markDisabledMessage=您可以将用户的个人资料标记为已禁用，而不是删除用户。这将阻止他们登录，并保留与他们编写的脚本相关的访问权限。 XWiki.Registration_liveValidation_enabled.hint=将此项设置为 false 可禁用实时验证 JavaScript 代码（字段仍将在服务器端进行验证）。 XWiki.Registration_liveValidation_defaultFieldOkMessage.hint=实时验证 显示一条消息，向用户指示他们已令人满意地填写了该字段。这是如果特定字段未覆盖该消息，他们将收到该消息。可以使用 Velocity 代码。
## Used to indicate where deprecated keys end #@deprecatedend
